segments.text: Hi ! How are things going with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am doing well . What ’ s up with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Believe it or not , the company I worked for closed down , so I ’ m out of a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The same with me . Have you given much thought to what you want to do next ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not being all that particular right now because I just need to keep a roof over my head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about interviews ? Have you been on any of those yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish that I could get the opportunity to be interviewed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the electrician program that they have listed over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I read about that , and the position sounded great !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s go see how we can apply for those positions .
segments.speaker: S2
